bug.author: TimSYQQX
bug.description:
Describe the bug When I run Supervisedrunner().train(). The progression bar is stucked and the system freeze when I try to terminate the process in anyways. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Use ubuntu 18.04LTS create a python3.7 Conda environment run https://www.kaggle.com/timsyqqx/segmentation-in-pytorch-using-convenient-tools in that environment.
Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: Also, its worth noting that I'm using ryzen 1700 processor. After tracing the process, it seems like its a threading problem.
Please, try to use different torch version, there are several issues with gpus compatibility.
